# sendgrid_validate_domain (Resource)

Resource to validate domain

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "sendgrid_validate_domain" "validate_domain" {
  id = sendgrid_domain_authentication.domain.id
}
```

- `id` (Number) The ID of the link branding
